content: Keep your electronic devices juiced up when you go off the grid by keeping them charged using the hydrogen reactor portable fuel cell. The double hydrogen core design provides the power equivalent of 30 AA batteries –  making it ideal for disaster readiness.

Enjoy a little fresh air without having to scorch your skin under the unrelenting sun by taking shelter under the canopy swing bed. Ideal for any backyard, it provides a comfortable resting spot outside where you can enjoy the warm weather while still remaining cool.

Enjoy the unmatched sound quality of vinyl no matter where you go by bringing along the portable turntable. The minimalist design is USB enabled, comes with a built in headphone jack and features two speeds so you can enjoy your tunes just how you like them.

Get an astronomer’s point of view of the night sky as you stare at its many star formations on the glowing constellations globe. This 2-in-1 globe displays the continents during the day and comes alive at night as it displays the many constellations.

Give poker nights a regal touch by breaking out these one of a kind gold playing cards. Featuring Ben Franklin’s lucrative mug, the deck comes coated with 999.9 foil gold plating and features a beautiful mahogany case to keep them in mint condition.

Spice up mealtime by giving mom’s bland home cooking a kick of flavor with sriracha flavored ketchup. The world’s most famous condiment receives a touch of spice and a hint of garlic that combine to give your favorite foods a delicious zing.

Simplify your life by re-ordering all of your daily essentials with ease from the most trusted online store on the web – Amazon. Available for all kinds of products, the button allows instant re-ordering – just keep it out of reach from your kids and drunk guests.

Give your PC a vintage feel with this steampunk keyboard. This gorgeous handmade item is polished to a high shine and features long lasting typewriter style keys and a Victorian chaise lounge design for a truly unique writing experience.

Enjoy a nice juicy T-Bone steak anytime the craving strikes by effortlessly whipping one up with the smokeless indoor grill. Perfect for those who lack the space for a full sized grill, this compact cooking surface goes over your stove top so you can grill anytime.

Give your shoes the mirror-like shine a gentleman such as yourself deserves using the hands free electric shoe polisher. It automates every step of the shoe polishing process to deliver a professional buff and shine from the comfort of home.

Inebriate your taste buds with the delightfully sweet taste of the whiskey filled chocolate bar. Wrapped in gold foil, this Swiss treat delivers a unique combination of good old American bourbon mixed with exquisite milk chocolate that’ll satisfy any chocolate lover.

Experience your favorite cookie like never before when you bite into a delicious green tea Oreo. Straight from the land of the rising sun, this exotic treat replaces the traditional white cream filling with a green tea flavored cream sure to please the palate.

Get a life-saving fire going in the most inhospitable and wet environments by using these stormproof matches. Ideal for the great outdoors, the matches burn for around 15 seconds and come in a durable, waterproof container with a built-in striker on the side.

Scale the tallest walls with the greatest of ease when you’re equipped with the carabiner grappling hook. Hand forged from steel, it’s designed to hold heavy loads and features collapsible hooks designed for easy transport.

Give your modern home a vintage touch the whole family will enjoy when you hang the moving eye Kit-Cat clock on your wall. As time marches on, old Kit-Cat’s wagging pendulum tail and revolving eyes swing from side to side to delight all who pass by.

Make the most out of your vehicle’s only power outlet by maximizing its potential with the car electrical socket hub. Once connected, you’ll have up to 4 sockets and 1 USB port at your disposal so every passenger can charge their devices simultaneously.

Keep your nails looking rockin’ in between manicures by trimming them using the guitar shaped nail file. The file comes in one of three classic guitar types and makes it look like you’re playing the world’s smallest guitar as you file away.

Stay prepared for any situation you encounter in the great outdoors by packing all the gear you could ever need into the tactical backpack. This heavy duty pack features a unique M.O.L.L.E strap system that allows you to wear your equipment rather than carry it.

Fire your expensive personal trainer and get in the best shape of your life using these exercise flash cards as your guide. These fitness themed flash cards come with detailed illustrations of various workout techniques you can perform anytime, anywhere.

Turn your computer room into your very own toy factory when you make your own action figures using the professional desktop 3D printer. This innovative printer lets you safely design one of a kind toys and figurines from the comfort of home.

Prepare yourself for the coming apocalypse by training your eyes to spot the undead with the “Where’s The Zombie” book. Like a “Where’s Waldo with zombies”, it comes chock full of gruesomely funny illustrations making it a perfect gift for any zombie lover.

titleEN: Anonymously Send A Bag Of Dicks
content: Settle the score like the mature adult you are by anonymously sending your enemies a bag of edible dicks. Simply provide the shipping address of your boss, an ex-lover, or anyone who has ever wronged you – and the courier will take care of the rest.

Carry all your keys conveniently without creating an unsightly bulge in your pockets by using the compact key holder multi-tool. Apart from storing up to 6 keys, this sleek Tic Tac sized accessory boasts a slew of handy tools like a bottle opener and a USB flash drive.

Set up a canine playground old Sparky will enjoy for hours on end in mere seconds with the dog play tunnel. The tunnel pops open in a flash to create a fun and appealing place for your doggy to play in and folds flat just as easily for convenient storage.

Feed your need for speed this winter by charging down the snow covered slopes on the inflatable sled. This boogie-board styled sled is designed with i-beams for shock resistance and features a ribbed underbelly for improved steering.

Be inconspicuously ready when trouble comes your way by wearing the baseball cap self defense tool. This discreet hat allows you to store a deadly tool that can be readied in a moment’s notice to protect yourself and your loved ones.

Get the ultimate action shot by setting your camera precisely where you need using the GoPro flexible clamp mount. This versatile mount lets you mount your camera directly onto the clamp or onto a flexible neck that you can position any way you want.

Make the holiday season a memorable one by sharing a sack of Pete’s famous Scheddy Balls with your loved ones. These mouth-watering balls feature a delightful sweet and salty flavor that thrill the taste buds like only Schweddy balls can.

Blind the enemy with a flurry of color before their inevitable demise by heading into battle with the color changing lightsaber. Designed for full-contact dueling, each lightsaber can be customized using interchangeable parts.

Attention geeks! A few dabs of this specialized grip wax is all you need to keep your spectacles from sliding down your nose once and for all. Simply apply a little of this specially formulated all natural wax to the frame and you’ll be set.

Avoid becoming roadkill during your next nocturnal bike ride by lighting the way with the virtual bicycle safety lane. The apparatus conveniently mounts on the bike and projects two highly visible red lasers that serve as lane markers on the road.

titleEN: Baby Up In This Bitch Car Sticker
content: Force the mark ass drivers around you to take notice in the fact that you’re transporting precious cargo with the “baby up in this bitch” car sticker. It’s the ideal way to inform your fellow drivers to be careful without losing your street cred.

Wreak havoc on the imaginary battlefield by charging in on the remote control tank. This miniaturized 1/16th scale combat vehicle comes with a specialized gearbox that mimics real tank movements, such as a rotating and elevating gun turret.

Protect your hands and look tough as you beat down on grease build-up while wearing the tattooed dishwashing gloves. These pink latex beauties come adorned with classic “tough guy” tattoos emblazoned along the knuckles.

Get professional looking shots when you’re out on the field by taking the portable pop-up lightbox studio in tow. This compact cube sets up in an instant and comes with built in LEDs to give your subject just the right amount of lighting.

Keep your driveway snow-free all season long by easily sweeping away the white stuff using the cordless snow shovel. This lightweight tool runs up to 50 minutes on a single charge and is ideal for quickly cleaning decks, sidewalks, and steps without the fuss.

Bring life into your home as you make gardening fun again with the rain cloud watering pot. The pots can be placed either on the wall or table and feature a clever design that allows the plant to get watered by a tiny rain cloud above.

Ensure your possessions remain securely bound together when you’re on the go by placing the military grade rubber bands on the job. Each band is made from bicycle tubes for unrivaled strength – making them an indispensable tool when venturing into the wild.

Charge every single electronic device in your household simultaneously with the 49 port USB hub. Once you plug this hub into your PC, you’ll have ample room to fit and plug in every USB powered device you can get your hands on.

Find the key you’re looking for instantly by setting it apart from the rest with the .45 caliber gun shaped key. This deadly door unlocker features a small silver trigger and makes a great gift for any and all firearm aficionados.

titleEN: Live Long And Prosper Car Decal
content: Combat road rage by spreading a positive message to your fellow drivers through the “Live Long And Prosper” car decal. The famous Star Trek motto is displayed in the form of an iconic Vulcan salute – making it ideal for any Trekkie’s car.

Help yourself stay alert and focused throughout the day by snacking on some caffeinated sunflower seeds. If you missed out on your morning cup of Joe, these caffeinated, taurine and ginseng coated seeds will help keep you energized and alert all day long.

Keep your car’s paint job looking brand new when mother nature unleashes her icy fury by covering it using the inflatable car hail projector. It fits over most models and can be remotely activated so your car remains safe during a merciless hail storm.

Chewing is overrated – give your tired teeth a break by switching over to a completely liquid diet courtesy of the super blender. No matter what exotic ingredient you wish to throw in the mix, the razor sharp blades and 2 HP motor will pulverize it with ease.

Leave no man behind when you and your best pal hit up the local watering holes armed with the wingman shot glass. Whether your buddy wants to or not, they’re sharing in your legendary night of inebriation as they are forced to match you shot for shot.

Remain in control of your vehicle when travelling through icy roads by equipping it with these tire traction covers. These lightweight covers are easy to install and offer a convenient temporary solution when you need to give your tires a little extra traction.

Experience what it’s like to be rich enough to be able to sleep on your money when you lay on the hundred dollar bills bean bag chair. It’s puffy, extremely comfy, and comes designed to look like a fat stack of Benjamins – a must-have for any aspiring baller.

Live out your mid-life crisis vicariously through your child by buying him a attention grabbing sports car you can’t afford. The drivable Camaro comes fully loaded with a working radio in addition to the 12 volts of pure <del>Made in China</del> American muscle under the hood.

Whip up some delicious meals by following gourmet recipes to the letter with help from the app controlled smart baking scale. Rather than eyeballing measurements, the app integrated scale lets you know exactly how much of each ingredient you need.

titleEN: Childless Dual Income Family Car Decal
content: Let everyone know just how fabulous your “unfulfilled childless life” is going with this dual income family car sticker. Rather than having to worry about diapers and college tuitions, you and your spouse are out blowing your surplus of cash on whatever tickles your fancy.

Equip your home bar to handle any request that comes your way with the bartending tools kit. Comprised of 13 separate stainless steel pieces, you’ll have everything necessary to whip up complex and exotic cocktails just like the pros.

Experience the excitement of intergalactic aerial battles first hand with the LEGO Star Wars X-Wing. This highly detailed Starfighter is made up of over 1500 pieces and features an opening cockpit and a R2-D2 droid mounted overhead for unrivaled realism.

Enjoy a healthy helping of starch in every meal by preparing yourself a tasty side dish using the french fry slicer. With one swift motion, you can turn large or whole potatoes into deliciously thick fries the whole family will drool over.

The days of physically walking over to the light switch are finally over thanks to the introduction of the smartphone controlled light bulbs. The bulbs can be controlled from a smartphone or tablet while allowing you to effortlessly customize the lighting effect.

Ensure you’re never left in the dark when the lights go off by keeping these Pac-Man light sensitive ghost lamps nearby. These one-time-foes have switched sides and are here to lend a helping hand by automatically turning on when the lights dim.

Replace every piece in your BBQ arsenal with one tool to rule them all with the multifunction BBQ tool. This versatile utensil features a unique spatula design that incorporates a multitude of handy tools like tongs and a fork into a compact and easy to handle package.

Improve your chances of staying alive when stranded in the wild by carrying the emergency whistle and fire starter. This durable tool is built to function up to 3,000 strikes and features a useful whistle built into the handle so you can signal for help.

Help your liquor go down more easily by serving it in the freezable gel shot glasses. These sturdy shot glasses are made from a non-toxic gel that won’t break when you inevitably drop them, and come in vibrant colors that make it easy to keep track of your drink.

Ensure your bundle of joy remains safe when they’re not with you by tracking their every movement using the smart baby monitor. Designed for today’s tech savvy parents, it tracks and sends your baby’s position, sounds, and breathing directly to your smartphone.

Enjoy all natural icy treats at a fraction of the cost by cutting out the middleman and making them yourself with the electric ice cream maker.  Using fresh ingredients from your local market you’ll be able to whip up delicious treats that the whole family will love.

Fill your fridge up with delicious <del>questionanbly sized</del> all natural fruit year round by planting these giant strawberry seeds. These <del>hormone injected</del> perennial and winter hardy seeds are easy to grow and produce large succulent strawberries the size of apples.

Drift off into a pleasant night’s slumber as you count nugs of top shelf ganja when sleeping on the stash bag pillow case. Apart from the alluring exterior, the pillow case features a hidden compartment ideal for hiding all your “sleep” paraphernalia.

Get incredible action shots of your unsuspecting neighbors going about their daily activities by invading their privacy with the GoPro mounted quadrocopter. It offers easy maneuverability and features extreme camera stability for smooth video recording.

Increase your chances of survival as the concrete jungle crumbles around you by carrying the urban bug out bag. This heavy duty backpack sports an understated black exterior designed to conceal the bountiful survival supplies stored inside.

Learn about the mechanics of perpetual motion by engineering your own masterpiece with the Rube Goldberg machine kit. After assembling all 602 pieces together, the structure towers at 78″ tall and provides the ultimate course for your marble to travel through.

Increase your chances of getting spotted from a distance by popping off a green smoke grenade in emergency situations. Once activated, the grenade releases a massive cloud of colorful smoke that burns for an average of ninety seconds.

Get the rock hard body of a convicted felon without worrying about getting shanked in between sets by reading the “Convict Conditioning Workout” book. You’ll learn all the secrets of unleashing your own raw power and brute strength using limited equipment.

Keep your culinary instruments handy so you can slice and dice at a moments notice by hanging them on the stainless steel magnetic knife rack. The blades adhere to the magnetic surface for easy access while giving your kitchen a professional and minimalistic feel.

Create a fun and engaging environment for guests at your next soirée by serving your delicious eats on the chalkboard table runner. It’s made from extruded food safe plastic and comes with specialized chalk so you can write or draw whatever you wish around your food.

Enjoy the seas’s glorious natural beauty at anytime of the year by turning on the ocean wave light projector. The projected effects will immerse you completely in the sea’s warm embrace while a built in speaker serenades your ears with the music of your choosing.

Blast off and set course for adventure by embarking on countless imaginary missions while playing in the astronaut space mission sandbox. This compact sandbox comes with all the space tools necessary for exploration of the great unknown.

Add a little magic to your day by transforming your hand into a majestic creature using the unicorn finger puppet. This five piece vinyl set fits snugly over each finger so that you may entertain yourself and others with a glorious little white unicorn.

Ensure your expensive equipment remains in pristine condition by rolling it up in the burrito camera lens wrap. This delicious looking wrap is made from super tough Tyvek fabric and is designed to guard an array of lenses from dirt, water, and scratches.

End glitter’s reputation of being the herpes of the arts and crafts world by handing out these glitter clean up cloths to your students. The specialized sticky surface of the cloth acts as a glitter magnet that sucks up every little insufferable speck of glitter.

Stay warm and toasty while travelling through bitter cold weather by wrapping yourself up in the electric heated travel blanket. The blanket plugs easily into the car’s electrical outlet and heats up the soft fleece so you remain cozy and comfortable while on the go.

Keep your mobile workstation up and running long after your batteries deplete with help from the handy portable power outlet. This compact and lightweight charger provides ample juice for powering up your smartphone, tablet, or laptop.

The beer making kit has just made your local watering hole obsolete. No longer must you traverse great distances in order to suckle from the life-giving nectar that is beer. Instead, you’ll be able to brew it to your exact liking in the comfort of your very own home.

Perform mind-boggling aerial stunts effortlessly when you take to the skies with the double flip quadrocopter. This easy to pilot quadrocopter features vibrant LEDs perfect for night flying, performing single and double flips with the push of a button.

Enjoy a frosty brew without succumbing to frostbite by making sure you wear these mitten beer kookzies. These koozies comes expertly stitched and feature an innovative style designed to keep your hands warm and brew ice cold – making it ideal for outdoor drinking.

Avoid catching waterborne diseases the next time you’re forced to drink from an unsavory water source by making it safe to drink with the handheld UV water purifier. This compact tool destroys over 99.9% of harmful bacteria and can filter up to 8,000 liters.

Take down any predator that crosses your path – no matter the size – when armed with the compressed gas injection knife. Apart from its razor sharp edge, the knife injects compressed gas into the prey via a small opening in the blade, causing explosive damage.

Increase your chances of rescue in emergency situations by signaling your position using an industrial grade glow stick. This completely waterproof and non-flammable 6″ stick provides 360 degree visibility for up to 12 hours and can be seen from a mile away.

titleEN: Objects In Mirror Are Losing Decal
content: Turn a leisure afternoon drive into a heart-pumping drag race by placing the “objects in mirror are losing” decal on your side mirror. This novelty sticker provides a humorous touch for any car and makes a great gift for gear heads with a competitive nature.

Bring the party to wherever you are by rolling with the mobile boombox sound system. This top of the line sound system peaks at a whopping 2400 watts and comes with a 12″ competition subwoofer perfect for bumping those tunes so everyone can get down.

Add a dash of adorable to your meals using the baby panda origiri set. With this easy to use set anyone will be able to create adorable little seaweed and white rice pandas ideal for adding a touch of creativity to your exotic meals.

Give your offspring a taste of the finer things in life when you place them behind the wheel of the kid’s Maybach ride on car. This pint-sized luxury vehicle comfortably seats one and comes with a 12 volt engine that tops out at an ass clenching 2.5 miles per hour.

Protect yourself from insurance fraud next time you get into an accident by installing the car dashboard camera inside your vehicle. This tiny cam mounts directly onto your car’s windshield so that you can accurately capture events that occur while driving.

Keep every testosterone-laden hair on your masculine body looking luscious by lathering up with these grooming products for men. A variety of top-quality products ranging from shampoo to face washes are at your disposal so your mane will look fabulous.

Take on a new persona the next time you go drinking by using these face drink coasters. Each novelty coaster comes imprinted with a distinct face on each side and a special notch at the top so you can place them on your nose and wear them as a mask.

Control your gluttonous and impulsive eating habits by storing your favorite foods inside of the time locking kitchen container. This one of a kind container features a programmable lid that locks itself for up to 10 days, and cannot be opened until the timer runs out.

Summon the ultimate forces of good to combat against injustice and evildoers in Toytown with the LEGO Marvel superheroes. Everyone from the mighty Hulk to the fearless Captain America have assembled in the name of fun and justice.

Give your little princess the magical night sky she’s always dreamed of with these solar powered fairy lights. Once you set them up among the natural greenery, they recharge through a solar panel during the day so they can shine bright at night with no cost.

Enjoy swallowing a variety of cock everyday by receiving some helpful tips from the “50 Ways To Eat Cock” cookbook. This holy grail of culinary literature will show you how to prepare cock so you can improve your doctor recommended level of protein intake.

Hotel amenity thieves rejoice! Now you can stock up on resort grade wooden hangers for a fraction of the cost when you purchase these hanger adapters. The adapters transform them into a standard hanger you can utilize to steam your shirts or hang in your closet.

Overshadow the more talented members of your band with cheap gimmicks by playing with these light up drumsticks. These roadie approved drumsticks light up in a deep blue that creates an incredible visual effect while you play your mediocre heart out.

The Batmobile iPhone case isn’t the case your phone needs, it’s the case it deserves. This bat-tastic case protects your iPhone while transforming it into a small replica of the Caped Crusader’s iconic black ride from Tim Burton’s Batman movie.

Create brilliant seizure inducing light shows by putting on a visually stimulating performance using the light up LED lightstick. This must-have raver accessory can be set to various equally captivating colors and lighting effects.

Become the prime target of international muggers everywhere by travelling abroad with the money stash lined backpack. While the exterior is low key, the inside features a realistically detailed graphic that makes it seem like it’s full of fat stacks.

Go green at your next outdoor cookoff by grilling up your food on the solar powered cooker. On sunny days you’ll be able to boil water in just 10 minutes while reaching grilling temperatures of up to 750F – all while being able to cater to different cookware.

Turn a healthy snack into an artery clogging treat with the caramel apple candy dipper. This 27 oz. dipping pot features a wrap around tray designed to facilitate adhering toppings without making a mess while also keeping caramel at the ideal dipping temperature.
